import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[eventCounts,setEventCounts]=useState([]);const[systemActive,setSystemActive]=useState(false);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const ws=new WebSocket('ws://engine:8000/ws');ws.onopen=()=>{console.log('Connected to Engine WebSocket');};ws.onmessage=event=>{try{const data=JSON.parse(event.data);setMessages(prev=>[...prev,`Type: ${data.type}, Source: ${data.source}, Content: ${data.content}, Timestamp: ${data.timestamp}`]);// Update eventCounts for chart
setEventCounts(prevCounts=>{const timestamp=new Date(data.timestamp);const timeKey=timestamp.toISOString().slice(0,16);// up to minute precision
const existingIndex=prevCounts.findIndex(item=>item.time===timeKey);if(existingIndex>=0){const updated=[...prevCounts];updated[existingIndex].count+=1;return updated;}else{return[...prevCounts,{time:timeKey,count:1}];}});}catch(e){setMessages(prev=>[...prev,event.data]);}};ws.onclose=()=>{console.log('WebSocket connection closed');};return()=>{ws.close();};},[]);const toggleSystem=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const newState=!systemActive;// Call agent endpoint
await fetch(`http://localhost:8080/${newState?'activate':'deactivate'}`,{method:'POST'});// Call engine endpoint
await fetch(`http://engine:8000/api/engine/${newState?'activate':'deactivate'}`,{method:'POST'});setSystemActive(newState);}catch(error){console.error('Error toggling system:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"SecureShield Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"toggleSystemBtn",type:"button",className:`text-white text-sm font-semibold px-4 py-1 rounded ${systemActive?'bg-green-600':'bg-red-600'}`,"aria-pressed":systemActive,"aria-label":"Toggle system status",onClick:toggleSystem,disabled:loading,children:systemActive?'System On':'System Off'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Live Attack Analysis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:messages.map((msg,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:msg},idx))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:300},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Attack Trend (Events per Minute)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:eventCounts,margin:{top:5,right:30,left:20,bottom:5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{allowDecimals:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"count",stroke:"#8884d8",activeDot:{r:8}})]})})]})]});}export default App;
